data.text:
Having an older sister who outdoes you all can be daunting, but in the case of R&B singer Solange Knowles the reverse was true, she was determined to make it in the entertainment industry despite having been to many times overshadowed by her older sister by the media despite considering her to be Beyoncé. model.

Despite public efforts to put her second best to her sister, Solange continued to declare her independence. In an interview with Daily Mail, she explained that people expect them to be rivals but they have never faced any competition. The age gap between them is huge and they are different characters.

Solange was finally able to overcome the ups and downs as the sister of a superstar and made a name for herself in the entertainment industry as a singer, dancer and model. Alongside her sister Beyoncé, she modeled for the House of Deréon family clothing line, she once danced for her sister’s child, Destiny, and is now a renowned singer and songwriter who has awarded a Grammy Award in his 2016 album A Seat at the Table.

Solange Knowles: brief bio (age)

R&B singer Solange Piaget Knowles, known to her fans as Solange Knowles, was born on June 24, 1986 to father Mathew Knowles, owner of the Music World Entertainment brand and mother Tina of the House of Deréon, a famous clothing line. Houston, Texas-born Solange is the sister of famed R&B singer Beyoncé of Destiny’s Child. Her father is of Afro-American descent and her mother is of Creole descent.

In her formative years, the future R&B singer and songwriter studied dance and acting. Her beginnings in the world of song are made at the age of five in an amusement park and at the age of nine, she begins to write songs. Solange was ready to record when she was 13, but her parents advised her to wait, as she thought she was still too young. The promising singer had the opportunity to replace a dancer and performer who disappeared at the age of 15. Shortly after, during the passage of Destiny’s Child in the tour of the famous American pop singer Christina Aguilera, she had to replace a member of Destiny’s Child, Kelly Rowland, victim of a domestic accident backstage during a costume change.

She then signed to her father’s company – Music World Entertainment, along with Columbia. His father was also his manager at the time.

Solange Knowles has other talents under her belt which include acting, dancing and being a good business leader. The R&B singer cum songwriter performs under the name Solange. She has made a big impact in the entertainment industry as a singer, model and dancer. Her own label Saint Records was launched in 2013. A Seat at the Table which was her 2016 album shot to the top of the Billboard charts and the following year led her to win her first Grammy Award.

Net value

The famous R&B singer and songwriter’s net worth is estimated at $8 million which she has earned throughout her career as a musician, model, actress, dancer and songwriter. The singer sensation is also known to have a good business leader who has paid off in her career.

Relationship to Daniel Smith, Jr.

Solange Knowles and Daniel Smith were both when teenagers married, the lovebirds were sweethearts right from high school before making the conscious decision to tie the nuptials in February 2004 after seven years together. The young couple moved to Idaho after the birth of their son, where Daniel continued his education.

Unfortunately, the marriage only lasted three years and the divorce came knocking at the door of their paradise in 2007. The fruit of this short union is a cute handsome named Daniel Julez J. Smith, Jr. whom Solange describes as the most great unplanned blessing although she partly expressed her regrets had to become a mother at a tender age. The singer wrote a song called 6 O’Clock Blues for his baby. The song was featured on his album titled Sol-Angel and the Hadley St. Dreams

For the young singer cum songwriter, her early marriage and divorce caused her to mature faster than her peers. According to her, the fact that she had already been married, had a child and divorced at the age of 21, gave her an insane outlook on life. After the couple’s amicable divorce, Solange moved to Los Angeles with her son. Many years later, in 2013, while David was continuing his studies, Solange announced that she would be moving with her son to New Orleans, Louisiana.

Most of the time, divorced or separated couples are expected to kick each other’s throats after a failed marriage, but Solange and Daniel have remained friends for the sake of their son and are dedicated to give him the best possible education given the situation. In an interview with Harper’s Bazaar, Solange Knowles revealed that between her and Daniel, co-parenting is going well. She can ask her ex-husband to babysit whenever she needs to be busy and that arrangement seems to work for them.

According to the records, Daniel played music for a brief period as a rapper and DJ. He reportedly went by the stage name ‘Yung Sosa’ and his debut album, Trillmatic, was released in December 2008. Since then, Daniel seems to have faded into the background and Solange prefers it that way and declined to comment on his son’s comments. father, his reasons being that they have a child together and it wouldn’t be right for him to grow up to read anything bad his mother might have said about his father or vice-versa. According to her, when there is a child involved in a separated marriage, it is better to give as little information as possible.
